ygData.subject: Re: Wizards
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey!  I second that motion! :)  We need *something* to help out in situations with large parties.  In such instances, it is most fun to plan a large assault on
ygData.messageBody:
Hey! I second that motion! :) We need *something* to help out in
situations with large parties. In such instances, it is most fun to plan a
large assault on a tough creature... we gotta be able to contribute in some
way. I think your idea is great...a weak but reliable spell seems to be a
reasonable compromise.

Forget the money and items....the best fun in EQ is taking out the named
NPCs! hehe. Dvinn and Dorn will fall many times before I will get sick of
watching them die.

-- Lim'Dul

<sniped from Solric's post>
Now I won't just cite a problem but also suggest a solution. The solution
is either to give us weak spells that cannot be resisted (the necros already
have one it's the lifetap series), make our DD spells less resisted, but do
less damage against higher level creatures, or even better still give us
some utility spells (buffs? damage shields? spheres of protection?) that
can be cast on party members.
